Html: I have very large markers and my selection is always behind them. Is it possible to set the zindex on the selection like you can on markers?
hm, well selection is rendered on the map control, all markers are on top of it, do you know the way around?

Radioman,

Thanks for the response.

I could go and modify gmap, but then the change would need to be done every update. I was wondering if it was possible currently.

If there is another way around, i dont know it :-)
if you managed to fix it, let me know
